nodes.documentation:
@title CappedMath
@dev Math operations with caps for under and overflow.
nodes.name: CappedMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two unsigned integers, returns 2^256 - 1 on overflow.
nodes.name: addCap

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two integers, returns 0 on underflow.
nodes.name: subCap

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two unsigned integers, returns 2^256 - 1 on overflow.
nodes.name: mulCap
